pyanp module¶

pyanp.py_iauAnp(double x)¶

Wrapper for iauAnp module (SOFA Documentation.). Normalise angle into the range 0 <= x < 2pi.

Parameters:x (float) – Angle (radians)
Returns:Normalised angle
Return type:(float)
